projects.title: Projects
projects.whatWeDo: What do we do to ensure the highest quality of our services?

section1.title: Check your site's performance
section1.subtitle: Google in 2021 introduced new standards for rating and positioning websites. Check if your website meets Google's new requirements

contactForm.messagePlaceholder: I would like to request a quote for a website.

item1.title: Manager of photo shoots for swiperight.pl
item1.paragraph: With the increasing number of customers Swiperight served, it began to increasingly need a reliable, automated service management process.

item2.title: What do we do to provide the best quality service to the customer?
item2.paragraph: Appearance, performance and intuitive operation are the three most important things when it comes to a website. We'll briefly tell you what we do to make sure each of these three points is top-notch.

item3.title: GoogleLighthouse's perfect score on Betterize
item3.paragraph: Betterize is a company focused on website development. It was very important to them to increase conversions and serve images on their site in the best possible way.

item1.question: Will it be easy to edit and update your website?
item1.answer: Yes, we hook up websites to a CMS system that allows you to easily edit and update content without coding knowledge

item2.question: Can I influence the design of the website?
item2.answer: Definitely yes! Your suggestions are key. We take into account your company's branding or together create a new one from scratch. Every aspect of the design is consulted with you so that the site meets your business goals. We determine the number of rounds of revisions to the design each time.

item3.question: Do you offer technical support for my website after implementation?
item3.answer: Yes, we offer technical support to our customers after the implementation of the website to ensure its operation without failure.

item4.question: What are the terms of my website design and implementation agreement?
item4.answer: Before starting the project, the client and our company sign a contract, which includes a detailed description of the services and a cost estimate. In the contract we also specify the deadlines for the project and the terms of payment.

item5.question: What are the costs of designing and implementing my website with CMS?
item5.answer: The cost of designing and implementing a website depends on many factors, such as the scale of the project, the number of pages and functionality. Before starting the project, we establish a detailed quote for services.

item6.question: What are the costs of hosting services for my website?
item6.answer: We offer proven and efficient hosting options for our clients. The cost of hosting services depends on the hosting option chosen by the client, such as the number of pages, disk capacity, data transfer, etc. For a simple company website, these costs range from 12 to 35 EUR per month.

hero.subtitle: Do you want better positioning and higher profits? Bet on the speed and quality of your website with Betterize!

card1.title: Prefabricated elements: The key to speed and reliability
card1.text1: With our knowledge and experience, we are able to tailor services to individual needs and requirements to achieve business success together.
card1.text2: We focus on speed, reliability and attention to detail to meet our customers expectations and help them stand out in the market.

card2.title: Matching solutions to industry needs
card2.text1: At Betterize, we realize that every industry has its own unique needs and requirements. That's why our priority is to adapt solutions to the specifics of your business.
card2.text2: We work with you to create solutions that will make your company stand out from the competition and gain an advantage in the market.

card3.title: We focus on small and medium businesses
card3.text1: We analyze the market and the competition to understand the key aspects of your business and deliver websites that fully reflect your company's values and goals.
card3.text2: Thus, we create sites quickly, reliably and with attention to detail, meeting the requirements of your business goals.

marketing1.title: need for speed
marketing1.subtitle: Why is website performance crucial to business?

card1.title: SEO
card1.paragraph: Faster pages have higher rankings in Google results, leading to more organic traffic (Google PageSpeed Insights)

card2.title: Higher customer retention
card2.paragraph: 79% of customers who experienced website performance problems do not return to that store (State of Online Retail Performance)

card3.title: Lower rejection rate
card3.paragraph: Pages loading 1-3s have a 32% higher risk of rejection, and those loading 1-5s as much as 90% higher!

card4.title: More activity on the site
card4.paragraph: Faster pages improve user activity metrics such as longer time on page and more pages visited

card5.title: Reduced decision time
card5.paragraph: Fast-loading pages allow users to make buying decisions faster, increasing sales (Forbes)

card6.title: More effective advertising
card6.paragraph: Faster pages lead to lower cost-per-click (CPC) and higher conversion rates in ad campaigns (WordStream)

marketing2.title: What customers are saying about us:

testimonial1.name: Grzegorz Wiosna
testimonial1.paragraph: We focused primarily on performance elements and improving the customer's path on the site so that the design matched the analytics. The result: 100% achievement of goals

testimonial2.name: Daniel Popek
testimonial2.paragraph: A lot of my customers complained that it was hard to go to my site and everything takes a long time to load on it. After the intervention of the guys at betterize, the page loading time on my phone more than doubled. I did not expect that my site could work, so fast. Full professionalism, I recommend.

testimonial3.name: Eryk Rąk
testimonial3.paragraph: Working with Betterize was the best decision I could have made. Their speed, professionalism and flexibility were second to none. I would recommend Betterize to anyone looking for quality Internet services.

steps.title: What our cooperation will look like

step1.title: Consultation
step1.paragraph: The first step is to consult with the client to understand their needs and business goals. At this stage, we determine what functionality and elements are to be included on the website. Throughout the project, we keep the client informed of the progress of the website stages.

step2.title: Design
step2.paragraph: We then create a visual design for the website. We present the client with several selected options so that they choose the design that best suits their needs and expectations.

step3.title: Coding
step3.paragraph: Once the design is approved, we move to the coding stage, where we transform the graphic design into a functional website. We focus on making the site fast, efficient and SEO-friendly.

step4.title: Testing
step4.paragraph: Once the coding is complete, we run tests to make sure the site works properly on different devices and browsers. We make sure your site's performance is at the highest possible level.

step5.title: Deployment
step5.paragraph: Once the website is ready, we carry out the implementation, that is, we put it on the server and make it available to the public. We also help set up analytical systems and marketing tools so that the client can effectively manage their site.

step6.title: Support and development
step6.paragraph: Our work does not end after the website is implemented. We also offer further technical support and development of the website so that it is always up-to-date and meets market requirements.
